attributes.review: I got this hoping it to be a good app, but it was the worst programming, setup, and technology I’ve ever laid eyes on. I had to re-download it around 25 times just to get it to open. When I finally got it to let me on it glitched SO much I just gave up. Anyways, settle for Biden 2020! BLM!!! Trump in prison 2020!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president only to see a large orange Cheeto puff on my screen. I am very disappointed in the quality. :(  I am very disappointed in the quality of the U.S. currently. I am very hopeful for change. Peace out ✌️😙
attributes.title: Why

attributes.review: It never works every time I go in to it it kicks me out. It took two weeks to download and it took up all my space it my phone after I deleted everything I noticed my phone died so fast and it gave me 10 viruses DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER😤

attributes.review: This app took 5 months to download and when it finally did, it kept glitching out and blaring racial slurs out of my phone. It doesn’t work and is 100% broken. Don’t ever download this app!! I’m pretty sure it hacked into my phone 😥.
attributes.title: The WORST app EVER!!

attributes.review: I wanted to get this app because it looked fun, so I went and tried to download it, and 2 weeks later, a lot of Apple support, I ended up having to get a new phone!!! This is because it wiped my whole phone like I took a magnet to it, DO NOT GET!!!!
attributes.title: DONT GET IT

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay informed but all it did was steal my information. I know a CHILD that was FATALLY harmed by people on this app. Please be aware of the dangers of this app. I don't wish anyone INCLUDING children to be hurt again from the people in charge of this app. Please be careful!!
attributes.title: UNSAFE

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it shut down my phone and and i turned back on it texted all my friends inappropriate stuff even my mom and the rest of my family. I don't recommend.
attributes.title: HACKED

attributes.review: So my app took over an hour to download and when I opened it I noticed a hot Cheeto on my screen, it took me awhile what the app was really abt. It never gave me the tru news only sum biased information and tried to take my happiness away✨🧚‍♂️😻✨✨✨
attributes.title: ✨Fairy comment ✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: As soon as I opened it it crashed and my phone started to open random apps and deleting and downloading randsom apps. It also deleted several photos and videos.
attributes.title: Do not recommend

attributes.review: This app is absolute, excuse my French, CRAP! Much too complicated to use, and the photo they used of Trump was quite horrifying. Cried for a few minutes looking at it. Should be taken down for SURE. The app does nothing constructive and neither does he 💅🏽
attributes.title: THE WORST! 😡😡
